output.name: NeWCRFs
output.description: NeWCRFs is a PyTorch implementation of neural windowing conditional random fields for monocular depth estimation. It provides training and evaluation scripts for the KITTI and NYU Depth V2 datasets, along with demo scripts and visualization of depth predictions.
featureList: Depth estimation using neural windowing conditional random fields
Training and evaluation pipelines for KITTI and NYU Depth V2 datasets
Demo scripts for running inference and visualizing predictions
imagingModality: Monocular RGB images for depth estimation
disciplineJustification: The software implements deep learning and computer vision methods for depth estimation, aligning with computer engineering research

alternateNames: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司

relatedToOrganizationJustification: Original code created by Alibaba Cloud OSS at https://github.com/aliyun/NeWCRFs
repositoryTypeJustification: This repository contains source code and scripts implementing a depth estimation research project
